channel.title: Top CIO News | Enterprise IT, Enterprise Technology, Tech Industry News - ET CIO : ETCIO.com
channel.description: Find the latest information & technology news, views and updates from all top sources for the Indian IT industry.

item.title: Women in STEM: Women CXO Speak
item.description: Are there enough women in STEM and are there enough opportunities for women to rise to leadership in tech? Some prominent women CXOs share their viewpoints and experiences.

image.title: Women in STEM: Women CXO Speak

item.title: New data protection bill draft is coming: 6 ways to ensure data security
item.description: The bill is aimed to provide protection of digital privacy to individuals relating to their personal data, specify the flow and usage of data, and create a relationship of trust between persons and entities processing the data. Such regulations are needed to safeguard the data and privacy of citizens.

image.title: New data protection bill draft is coming: 6 ways to ensure data security

item.title: Yes Bank aligns technology initiatives for business growth
item.description: Yes Bank’s Chief Information Officer, Mahesh Ramamoorthy shares key initiatives that the bank is working on to accelerate growth.

image.title: Yes Bank aligns technology initiatives for business growth

item.title: The key to upscaling your worth: Atanu Pramanic, CIO, Hindalco
item.description: Atanu Pramanic, Joint President and CIO, Hindalco Industries, reveals his career secrets in adapting to change in an ever-changing environment

image.title: The key to upscaling your worth: Atanu Pramanic, CIO, Hindalco

item.title: Edge Computing: Key trends and focus areas for CIOs
item.description: The growth of IoT and the empowerment of real-time analysis in edge devices are helping to create a new era of technological efficiency, cost control, and security. That's a great value proposition for businesses that want to stay competitive and lead their markets.

image.title: Edge Computing: Key trends and focus areas for CIOs

item.title: Developing a data architecture to drive digitalization
item.description: To better manage the data environment, numerous components of data architecture & procedures must be improved to examine, design, construct, transform, and manage.

image.title: Developing a data architecture to drive digitalization

item.title: HDFC Life adopts cloud for efficient financial reporting
item.description: The private life insurer gained a 48 percent improvement across all ETL job loads, allowing business users to perform faster queries on the corporate data warehouse, says Chief Architect and EVP, Sunil Jain.

image.title: HDFC Life adopts cloud for efficient financial reporting

item.title: Tata AIG plans to operate over 90 percent on cloud by year-end
item.description: Tata AIG General Insurance has initiated a variety of protocols and procedures with the objective of comprehensive cloud adoption across all verticals to create future-ready infrastructure. The company is also modernising and moving to microservices-based architecture for all its business applications.

image.title: Tata AIG plans to operate over 90 percent on cloud by year-end

item.title: Rajesh Thapar, CISO, Axis Bank unpacks the holistic approach to security
item.description: Research shows that financial companies experience cyberattacks 300 times more than other industries – highlighting how attractive and lucrative a target they are to cybercriminals.

image.title: Rajesh Thapar, CISO, Axis Bank unpacks the holistic approach to security

item.title: Why software intelligence matters for India's digital economy to thrive globally
item.description: Companies leveraging software intelligence are powering the next wave of India’s rapid digitalization.

image.title: Why software intelligence matters for India's digital economy to thrive globally

item.title: The role of data science in transforming the Indian trucking industry
item.description: Data Science, AI, and ML have evolved significantly in the last decade, witnessing widespread mainstream deployments across industries and delivering true ROI. In particular, Data Science has emerged as a force multiplier in logistics.

image.title: The role of data science in transforming the Indian trucking industry

item.title: Wipro plans Cloud 3.0 strategy; CIO Anup Purohit offers a peek at his cloud playbook
item.description: One of the largest tech services organisations, Wipro, is currently deep in its Cloud 2.0 strategy implementation. However, discussions around its Cloud 3.0 strategy have already started. Anup Purohit, CIO, Wipro throws light on best practices and risks that organisations need to factor in a while embarking on a cloud journey.

image.title: Wipro plans Cloud 3.0 strategy; CIO Anup Purohit offers a peek at his cloud playbook

item.title: Drip Capital enhances risk predictability model to counter security hurdles
item.description: As the company improves its risk assessment model with a resilient data management strategy, they are open to collaborating with partners who can meet the demand for data available via APIs

image.title: Drip Capital enhances risk predictability model to counter security hurdles

item.title: Dr. Anantha Sundararajan appointed as Dream Sports’s first Chief Data Officer
item.description: Anantha joins Dream Sports from Novartis, whereas Head DSAI & CDO, he played a key role in making Data Science & AI as part of the overarching competitive strategy for the company.

image.title: Dr. Anantha Sundararajan appointed as Dream Sports’s first Chief Data Officer

item.title: Evolving Cybersecurity Dynamics in a Hybrid Workplace
item.description: The only way the business can protect the businesses against emerging threat landscape is to get a clear understanding of the emerging treat vectors that looms the enterprises today and the practises necessary for protecting the remote workforce, hybrid workloads.

image.title: Evolving Cybersecurity Dynamics in a Hybrid Workplace

item.title: Three insurance processes where digital twins can bring change
item.description: Insurance providers must leverage advanced technologies such as digital twins along with AI and IoT to drive smarter underwriting and risk management approach. Digital twins are not just a process enhancement solution, but rather a valuable tool that can help insurers to deal with hyper-scale events such as natural disasters, pandemics, etc.

image.title: Three insurance processes where digital twins can bring change

item.title: Tata Motors digitises its manufacturing ecosystem
item.description: Tata Motors’ CIO, Gopinath Jayaraj shares how the automobile manufacturer is leveraging Industry 4.0 across its seven manufacturing units in India. He also throws light on how such a large organisation manages to infuse a digital-focused mindset among its employees.

image.title: Tata Motors digitises its manufacturing ecosystem

item.title: AI-first strategy: The new CIO normal
item.description: As AI becomes more affordable and cloud-based AI significantly reduces expenses - organizations seek to establish an AI-first data strategy to separate themselves from competitors and make better decisions over time.

image.title: AI-first strategy: The new CIO normal

item.title: Cybersecurity compliance – Is it still valuable for your business?
item.description: Modern challenges require modern approaches. Compliance has to move beyond policies and procedures to enterprise-wide initiatives. Security must move beyond the historical requirements of keeping enterprises safe and compliant with regulatory requirements to become a strategic enabler for businesses to improve customer satisfaction, drive innovation and growth, and reduce costs.

image.title: Cybersecurity compliance – Is it still valuable for your business?

item.title: Power of analytics and cloud to unlock business growth
item.description: The combined potential of analytics and cloud computing is tremendous; it supports business operations and decision-making strategies by providing predictive and prescriptive insights. In fact, the marriage of data analytics and cloud computing is so powerful that it can increase business revenue while lowering the investment costs required to achieve the desired results.

image.title: Power of analytics and cloud to unlock business growth

item.title: How using AI & ML will help businesses stay ahead of the curve
item.description: Data management and aggregation are the essential components of every cloud infrastructure. Organizations may create sophisticated analytics and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions to address distinct challenges provided they have the relevant data at hand.

image.title: How using AI & ML will help businesses stay ahead of the curve

item.title: Tata Motors benefits from ‘out-of-the box’ digital innovations for transporter ecosystem
item.description: The 77-year-old automobile manufacturer, Tata Motors has launched a connected vehicle management system and a robust spares marketplace among other initiatives to deliver a superior customer experience.

image.title: Tata Motors benefits from ‘out-of-the box’ digital innovations for transporter ecosystem

item.title: Time is my ATM: Jagdip Kumar, Lohia Corp
item.description: An avid book reader and a tech enthusiast, Jagdip Kumar, Chief Information Officer of Lohia Corp , shares the journey that led him to leverage time into gaining profits and successful management.

image.title: Time is my ATM: Jagdip Kumar, Lohia Corp

item.title: Cloud computing 3.0: Every second counts
item.description: While security & competence remain big concerns for organizations, data show that businesses are getting more confident in transferring critical operations to the cloud and accepting the cloud more than ever before.

image.title: Cloud computing 3.0: Every second counts
